column5: Just wondering if anyone could tell me if the road has reopened . Thanks for any info R
HOLLY MOLLY  Is that where you and I went to set up for bear RY ?

Thanks !! tried heading in last week and was meet by road closure signs on the East side of Pine Springs. We've been washed out there before , not fun and thank god active logging was going on or my jeep may still be back there.
We we're a little deeper in . But yep same general area .
Never did get back to that hog bass pond. LOL
It's fine if you're on a bicycle: short walk.
